body_html:
Great topic @carpodaster 😄

JS vs. Coffeescript
JS -> 👍 for not using Coffeescript anymore (it's basically dead and I don't see a point for anyone diving into it - even the Atom editor gets now fully rewritten in Vanilla JS)

slim vs. erb
❔ -> I don't care, slim is pretty close to haml which almost as widely used as erb, don't see it as that huge of a weirdness of the Teams App

jQuery vs. Vanilla JS
Vanilla JS -> 👍 for solving things with pure JS 🎉 I think it really increases code quality and understanding. Plus: JS is not that bad anymore (and does even feel better if you skip the jQuery parts)

body:
Great topic @carpodaster 😄 

**JS vs. Coffeescript**
**JS** -> 👍 for not using Coffeescript anymore (it's basically dead and I don't see a point for anyone diving into it - even the Atom editor gets now fully rewritten in Vanilla JS)

**slim vs. erb**
❔ -> I don't care, `slim` is pretty close to `haml` which almost as widely used as `erb`, don't see it as that huge of a weirdness of the Teams App

**jQuery vs. Vanilla JS**
**Vanilla JS** -> 👍 for solving things with pure JS 🎉  I think it really increases code quality and understanding. Plus: JS is not that bad anymore _(and does even feel better if you skip the jQuery parts)_
